body.book: The streaming guide to cataloging remote access multimedia [electronic resource] : a how-to virtual manual for catalogers /Veve, Marielle.c2010.DOI:10.7290/V7BG2KWM The streaming guide to cataloging remote access multimedia [electronic resource] : a how-to virtual manual for catalogers / Veve, Marielle. text Electronic books. Knoxville, Tenn. : Newfound Press, University of Tennessee Libraries, c2010. eng Open access, peer-reviewed manual that provides self-paced tutorials (in streaming video) for cataloging remote access multimedia. Recommendations made in the manual follow guidelines stated in AACR2r, OCLC, OLAC and LC for describing remote electronic and integrating resources up to the year 2010. RDA guidelines are not integrated. Title from HTML title page (Newfound Press Web site, viewed on Jan. 25, 2011). Includes bibliographical references. How to catalog Streaming video -- How to catalog Streaming audio -- How to catalog Podcasts -- How to catalog E-books -- How to catalog Web games. Open access, peer-reviewed manual that provides self-paced tutorials (in streaming video) for cataloging remote access multimedia. Recommendations made in the manual follow guidelines stated in AACR2r, OCLC, OLAC and LC for describing remote electronic and integrating resources up to the year 2010. RDA guidelines are not integrated. System requirements: Adobe Flash Player. Cataloging of nonbook materials Cataloging of audio-visual materials Cataloging of electronic information resources http://www.newfoundpress.utk.edu/pubs/veve/streaming-guides.html http://www.newfoundpress.utk.edu/pubs/veve/ URN:ISBN:0979729297 (electronic bk.) URN:ISBN:9780979729294 (electronic bk.) DOI:10.7290/V7BG2KWM
